title: Game Design-Based Mathematics Education Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic game mechanics understanding and secondary-level mathematics education experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening competency in designing blended learning activities using game design principles for pre-service and in-service secondary mathematics teachers

learning_goals: Learners can design visual representation activities for mathematical concepts using game design elements
Learners can improve game-based mathematics educational materials through peer assessment in collaborative learning environments
Learners can analyze learner engagement using online tools and incorporate findings into instructional design
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
